summary: ARS Consulting corporate website - multi-page site featuring GCC services, AI transformation, global talent solutions, and managed delivery with focus on enterprise clients
architectural_notes: Multi-page corporate website structure with 8+ pages
Professional enterprise-focused design targeting B2B clients
Navigation: Home | About | Services | GCC | Industries | Insights | Careers | Contact
Key CTAs: Talk to an Expert, Download Company Profile, Contact Us
Color theme: white and yellow palette with colored card elements

existing_features.title: Create Home page with hero section containing headline 'Engineering Intelligent Growth for the Modern Enterprise', sub-text 'Building Global Capability Centers, enabling AI-led transformation, and delivering scalable global operations.', and two CTA buttons: 'Talk to an Expert' and 'Download Company Profile'

Add 'What We Do' section on Home page listing four service areas: Global Capability Center (GCC) Setup & Scale, AI & Digital Transformation, Global Talent & Engineering Capability, and Global Delivery & Managed Operations

Add 'Why ARS Consulting' section on Home page highlighting five key differentiators: Strategy + Execution (not just advisory), Faster GCC setup and scaling, Enterprise-grade governance, Access to high-quality global talent, and Flexible engagement models
Add 'Industries We Serve' section on Home page listing five industries: Banking & Financial Services, Healthcare & Life Sciences, Retail & E-commerce, Technology & SaaS, and Manufacturing & Logistics
Add 'Engagement Model' section on Home page showing three-step process: Assess & Design, Build & Launch, and Scale & Optimize
Add final call-to-action section on Home page with text 'Ready to build your Global Capability Center or accelerate your digital transformation?' and a 'Contact Us' button

Create About Us page with 'Our Story' section containing a brief introduction of ARS Consulting and its mission, 'Mission' section stating 'To help enterprises build scalable, future-ready capabilities.', 'Vision' section stating 'To be a trusted partner for GCC and digital transformation globally.', and 'Leadership' section with COO profile and key leadership team

Create Services page detailing four service categories: Global Capability Center (GCC) with location strategy, operating model, talent setup, and governance; AI & Digital Transformation with AI adoption strategy, automation, and digital engineering; Talent & Engineering Capability with dedicated teams, skill-based hiring, and long-term capability building; Managed Delivery with end-to-end project delivery, performance governance, and cost optimization
Create dedicated GCC page explaining 'Why GCC?' with three benefits (Cost efficiency, Innovation, Faster delivery) and 'Our GCC Approach' showing three-step process: Assess → Setup → Scale

Create Industries page detailing how ARS supports each of the five industries: Banking & Financial Services, Healthcare & Life Sciences, Retail & E-commerce, Technology & SaaS, and Manufacturing & Logistics
Create Insights/Blog page featuring articles on four topics: GCC trends, AI in enterprises, Global delivery strategy, and Talent market insights
Create Careers page with three sections: 'Why work with ARS', 'Open positions' listing, and 'Talent community form' for applications
Create Contact page with contact form, email address field, phone number field, office location field, and LinkedIn profile link
Implement top navigation menu with links to all pages in this order: Home, About, Services, GCC, Industries, Insights, Careers, Contact

Establish a professional, modern design theme with corporate aesthetics suitable for an enterprise consulting firm, using a sophisticated color palette (avoiding blue and purple), clean typography, and consistent spacing throughout all pages
Update the global color theme to use white as the primary background color and yellow as the primary accent color throughout the application
Add background colors to all card components across all pages (Home, About, Services, GCC, Industries, Insights, Careers, Contact) to make them visually distinct

new_feature_requests.summary: Home page with hero, services overview, differentiators, industries, engagement model, and CTA
About Us page with story, mission, vision, and leadership profiles
Services page detailing GCC, AI transformation, talent capability, and managed delivery
Dedicated GCC page with benefits and approach (Assess → Setup → Scale)
Industries page showcasing support for banking, healthcare, retail, tech, and manufacturing
Insights/Blog page with GCC trends, AI topics, and talent market insights
Careers page with job listings and talent community form
Contact page with form, email, phone, office location, and LinkedIn link
Top navigation menu linking all pages
Change color theme to white and yellow with colored cards on each page
